name: billowing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
billow
to spread over a large area, or (especially of things made of cloth) to become filled with air and appear to be larger: Smoke billowed (out) from the burning building. The sheets/shirts hanging on the line billowed in the breeze. We watched the boats with their billowing sails.
